textAfterTable: Bang for the buck the price is the same for out of state as it is in state which comes to be about only $6,000 Will enjoy being here The classes are a great size with the right amount of student to teacher ratio Will learn a lot I love the information about this school. I can go to it and get my required classes out of the way and then transfer to a 4 year school Login to rate or flag the reviews Daniella from Los Angeles, CA 11/14/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 32 Categories Comments Campus Safety Several patrols by the Sheriff's department, both around and on campus. There are cameras and security guards. Of course, you're not allowed to fall asleep in the library
